Description: Body sherd of Chian Simple Animal Style pottery chalice; white slip; interior glazed streaky black; part of pomegranate pattern in added red and white above broken maeander band between pairs of white lines; exterior: painted decoration consisting of sphinx to left (part of hair, wing with red patch and trace of back remaining).
Bibliographic references: Lemos 1991 / Archaic Pottery of Chios. The Decorated Styles (p. 289, no. 871, pl. 119)
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GD.1019) (phase 2)
